verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--'bhitare tabe āilā kemane?
taiche kene prasāda laite nā kailā gamane?'

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; bhitare—inside; tabe—then; āilā—you came; kemane—how; taiche—in the same way; kene—why; prasāda laite—to take prasāda; nā kailā gamane—did you not go.
translation: The Lord asked, "How did you enter the room? Why didn't you go out to take your lunch in the same way?"
